entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Victoria Beach
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening and ending before morning. Clearing before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 10.
